messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Public School Factories  was: Harrassment was Teasing...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/31/2007 5:13:22 P.M. Pacific Daylight Time, artist@greycastle.us writes: Then  when I tried to pay him back this week he said Oh you
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/31/2007 5:13:22 P.M. Pacific Daylight Time,
artist@... writes:

Then when I tried to pay him back
this week he said "Oh you don't have to pay me back. We all use the
water and I've been thinking I need to help out with things since I am
making my own money now."

I almost fell over ...


__________________________________________

Again, so glad to read of this. I want to hear more and more about the
wonders of young people. I'm sick of the horrid stuff we hear...I'm so anti
trashing teens and young adults right now, I feel soap-boxable! :)

Plus, considering the difficulties I've had with my oldest especially, it's
so wonderful to read this, just to know that there are the amazing young
people I know to exist are REALLY out there. An example of the wonderful-ness ;)

Thanks again.
Karen
